00037 /*
00038 ** Ensure that header is included only once...
00039 */
00040 #ifndef _md_tbldefs_h_
00041 #define _md_tbldefs_h_
00042 
00043 /*
00044 ** Required header files...
00045 */
00046 #include "md_platform_cfg.h"
00047 #include "cfe.h"
00048 /* cfs_utils.h needed for CFS_SymAddr_t */
00049 #include "cfs_utils.h"
00050 
00051 /************************************************************************
00052 ** Type Definitions
00053 *************************************************************************/
00054 
00055 /* 
00056 **  \brief Memory Dwell structure for individual memory dwell specifications
00057 **
00058 **  \par Description
00059 **          To be valid, entry must either be a null entry
00060 **          (specified by a zero field length) or all of its
00061 **          address and length fields must pass various checks.
00062 **
00063 **          The following checks must be met for a valid non-null entry:
00064 **
00065 **          * Length fields must be 1, 2, or 4.
00066 **          * Delay can be any value in a uint16 field.
00067 **          * DwellAddress.SymName must be a null string or must be found in the Symbol Table.
00068 **          * The sum of DwellAddress.SymName plus DwellAddress.Offset must be in a valid range,
00069 **          as determined by OSAL routines.
00070 **          * If the Length field is 2, the sum of DwellAddress.SymName plus DwellAddress.Offset
00071 **          must be even.
00072 **          * If the Length field is 4, the sum of DwellAddress.SymName plus DwellAddress.Offset
00073 **          must be evenly divisable by 4.
00074 */    
00075 typedef struct
00076 {
00077     uint16          Length;       
00078     uint16          Delay;        
00079     CFS_SymAddr_t   DwellAddress; 
00080 } MD_TableLoadEntry_t;
00081 
00082 #define MD_TBL_LOAD_ENTRY_LNGTH sizeof(MD_TableLoadEntry_t)
00083 
00100 typedef struct
00101 {
00102     uint32 Enabled; 
00103 #if MD_SIGNATURE_OPTION == 1  
00104     char Signature[MD_SIGNATURE_FIELD_LENGTH];
00105 #endif
00106     MD_TableLoadEntry_t Entry[MD_DWELL_TABLE_SIZE];  
00107 } MD_DwellTableLoad_t;
00108 
00109 #define MD_TBL_LOAD_LNGTH        sizeof(MD_DwellTableLoad_t)
00110 
00111 
00112

00115 #endif /* _md_tbldefs_h_ */
